title: When I Kiss Em, They Stay Kissed
description: There is more to a kiss than your technique. Whether given to a family member, friend, lover, or spouse, a kiss holds immense power. When infused with meaningful intentions, it will leave the recipient with an unforgettable memory. This short read will fill you with so much nostalgia, desire, love, and romance that when you kiss em, they will stay kissed. Additional information on when the author first saw the true meaning of love, how heartbreak made her accomplish goals, and how the author saw the destructive forces of affairs that could have caused others to lose it all, and how in other cases it did.
author: L.A. Davis
